name: Magaca
reset-password-desc: Fadlan geli cinwaanka email-kaaga. Waxaad heleysaa xiriir email ah si aad u abuurto furaha cusub.
home-title-part1: Waxaan kaa caawin doonaa inaad hesho
home-subtitle: Halkan waa madal weyn oo aad ku iibsan, ku iibin, kuna kiraysan karto hantidaada adoon ku dhibtoon, kharash badanna kaaga bixin.
about-description-1: Kiraale waa suuqa hantida ma-guurtada ah oo u oggolaanaysa iibsade-yaasha iyo iibiye-yaasha inay si fudud u fuliyaan isdhaafsi-gooda.
have-a-question: Wax su'aal ah ma qabtaa? Nala soo xiriir!
have-a-question-subtitle: Waxaan halkan u jognaa inaan ku caawinno. Noo soo dir fariin, waanan kugu soo laaban doonaa sida ugu dhakhsiyaha badan.
contact-success: Fariintaada si guul leh ayaa loo diray. Waan kugu soo laaban doonaa dhowaan.
client-testimonials-subtitle: Platform aad u wanaagsan oo lagu iibiyo, gado, ama kiraysato hantida si toos ah ama iyadoo la adeegsanayo wakiilo aamin ah.
featured-properties-subtitle: Halkan ka eeg xulka gurayha aan bidhaamineyno isbuucan, ka xulo kan ku habboon noloshaada.
subscribe-subtitle: Is diiwaan geli si aad u hesho warar keena iyo warbixinnada ugu dambeeyay.
pre-purchase-desc: Ka hor intaadan bilaabin raadinta hantida, waa muhiim inaad go'aamiso miisaaniyaddaada. Diyaar noqoshada dhaqaale ayaa kaa caawin doonta inaad si degdeg ah u qaadato tallaabo markaad hesho hantida saxda ah.
schedule-a-showing-desc: Inaad soo eegto hantida ayaa kuu oggolaanaysa inaad qiimeyso xaaladeeda, qaabkeeda iyo goobaha ku xeeran. Qorshee booqasho si aad u baadhid hantida aad u baahan tahay.
submit-an-offer-desc: Markaad hesho hantida kugu haboon, gudbinta dalabka waa tallaabada xigta. Tani waxay ka kooban tahay soo jeedin qiimo iyo shuruudo ku habboon iibsadaha iyo iibiyaha.
property-inspection-desc: Baaritaanka hantidu waxay kaa caawineysaa in la ogaado dhibaatooyinka hantida ka hor intaadan iibsan. Tani waxay hubinaysaa inaad ogtahay xaalada hantida ka hor inta aan la gaba-gabeyn heshiiska. Samee baaritaan xeel dheer ee hantida si aad uga fogaato lama filaan.
appraisal-desc: Qiimayntu waxay kaa caawisaa in la go'aamiyo qiimaha suuqa ee hantida, taasoo hubinaysaa in qiimaha aad bixineyso uu ku habboon yahay qiimaha ay leedahay hantidu. La tasho khubaro si aad u hesho qiimaynta saxda ah.
closing-deal-desc: Habka xidhida waxaa ku jira gabagabeynta warqadaha, wareejinta milkiyadda, iyo helitaanka furaha hantidaada cusub.
price-your-property-desc: Dejinta qiimaha saxda ah waa fure lagu soo jiidanayo Iibsade-yaasha. Raadi hantiyo la mid ah goobtaada si aad u hubiso in qiimahaagu yahay mid suuqa la tartami kara.
prepare-your-home-desc: Aragtida ugu horreysa waa muhiim. Nadiifi, kala saar, oo samee dayactir-ka loo baahan yahay si aad ugu muujiso gurigaaga habka ugu fiican.
list-your-property-desc: Dhigidda hantidaada Kiraale.com waxay kaa caawinaysaa inaad gaarto iibsadayaal badan. Is muuji oo mar walbo isticmaal sawiro tayo leh.
schedule-showings-desc: U oggolow Iibsade-yaasha suurtagalka ah inay booqdaan hantidaada. Qorsheyn dabacsan waxay kordhin kartaa xiisaha waxayna dedejin kartaa habka iibka.
review-offers-desc: Marka dalabyo yimaadaan, si taxaddar leh u qiimee qiimaha iyo shuruudaha. Ka fiirso qadarka dalabka iyo awoodda iibsadaha ee uu si degdeg ah ku dhammeystiri karo iibka.
finalize-sale-desc: Markaad aqbasho dalab, tallaabada ugu dambeysa waa saxiixida warqadaha, wareejinta milkiyadda, iyo helitaanka lacagta.
about-matching-description: Waxaan isku xirnaa iibsade-yaasha, iibiye-yaasha, kirayste-yaasha iyo milkiilayaasha hantida, taasoo fududeyneysa ganacsiga hantida ma-guurtada ah.
about-automation-description: Laga bilaabo xayeysiinta ilaa bixinta lacagta, madalkeenna wuxuu hawsha ka dhigaa mid iskeed u socota, si loo helo waxtar iyo hawl fududeyn.
about-listings-description: Ka hel hanti kala duwan oo la jaanqaadaysa baahidaada, iyadoo liisasku yihiin kuwo la cusbooneysiiyo mar walbo oo leh qiimeyn hufan.
services-subtitle: Waxaan fududeyneynaa isdhaafsiga hantida ma-guurtada ah iyadoo la adeegsanayo adeegyo xirfadeed oo kala duwan.
services-matching-desc: Waxaan isku xirnaa iibsade-yaasha, iibiye-yaasha, kirayste-yaasha iyo milkiilayaasha hantida si loo fududeeyo ganacsiga.
services-listings-desc: Si fudud u xayeysii oo u maamul hantidaada iyadoo aad adeegsaneya madalkeenna.
services-payments-desc: Habka bixinta lacagta ee Kiraale waa ammaan oo hufan, taasoo hubinaysa in dhammaan isdhaafsigu si fudud u dhaco.
services-insights-desc: Hel xogta suuqa hantida ma-guurtada ah ee waqti hadda tagan iyo qiimaynta saxda ah ee suuqa uu ka joogo gurigaaga.
services-management-desc: Waxaan bixinaa adeegyo maamul hanti oo dhameystiran si loo hubiyo in hantidaada si wanaagsan loo ilaaliyo oo ay faa’iido u yeelato.
services-security-desc: Waxaan mudnaanta siineynaa amniga xogtaada si aan u ilaalino macluumaadkaaga shakhsi ahaaneed iyo inaan xaqiijino macaamil ammaan ah.
services-support-desc: Kooxdeenu waxay had iyo jeer diyaar u tahay inay kaa caawiso baahiyahaaga hantida ma-guurtada ah.
subject: Mawduuca
min-length: {field} waa inuu ahaadaa ugu yaraan {min} xaraf.
developed-by: Kiraale. Qaabeynta & Horumarinta waxaa sameeyay si ❤️ leh
favorite-properties-description: Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa dhammaan hantida aad jeceshahay. Waxaad si fudud u maareyn kartaa dhamaantood, sidoo kalena kala xiriiri karta iibiyeyaasha.
no-favorite-properties-description: Weli maad ku darin hantida jeceshahay halkaan. Bilow baadhista hantida oo ku dar kuwa aad jeceshahay, kadib waxaad ka heli doontaa halkan.
add-property-desc: Ku dar hantidaada halkaan si aad u gaarto iibsade-yaal iyo kirayste-yaal badan.
property-added-successfully: Hantida si guul leh ayaa loogu daray.
property-add-failed: Hantida lama guulaysan in lagu daro. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
property-updated-successfully: Hantida si guul leh ayaa loo cusbooneysiiyay.
select-images-info: Xulo sawirro si aad u soo gudbiso
upload-property-image: Soo gudbi Sawirradaada Hantida Halkan. (Ugu yaraan 4 sawir/Video)
image-upload-info: Waxay la ogol yahay JPG, PNG iyo MP4 video. Cabbirka ugu badan ee faylka: 10MB.
upload-error: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la soo gudbinayay sawirka: {fileName}.
unexpected-error: Khalad aan la filayn ayaa dhacay: {error}.
property-uploaded: Sawirrada hantida si guul leh ayaa loo soo gudbiyey.
media-deleted: Sawirrada ama sawir-ka waa la tirtiray.
delete-error: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la tirtirayay sawirka: {fileName}.
minimum-4-images-required: Ugu yaraan 4 sawir ayaa loo baahan yahay. Fadlan marka hore sawirro dheeraad ah soo geli, ka dib kuwa kale tirtir.
profile-picture-updated: Sawirka shaqsiga si guul leh ayaa loo cusboonaysiiyey.
no-properties-description: Lama helin hantida ku habboon raadintaada. Fadlan dib u habee ereyga raadinta iyo shuruudaha ka dibna isku day mar kale.
property-not-found-description: Hantida aad raadinaysid ma jirto ama waa la tirtiray.
no-featured-properties-found-description: Lama helin hantida isbuuca. Waa la heli doonaa dhawaan. Fadlan dib u eeg mar dambe.
feature-subtitle: Hel hab fudud oo hufan oo lagu iibiyo, lagu kireeyo ama lagu helo guryo, si toos ah ama iyadoo loo marayo wakiillo lagu kalsoon yahay.
feature-evaluate-description: Baadh faahfaahinta hantida, is barbar dhig qiimaha ah samee dhan walbo, si aad u gaarto go'aanno xog ogaal ah.
feature-agent-description: Qorshee kulamada wakiilada si aad ugala wada hadasho ikhtiyaarada hantida oo aad u hesho xog dhameystiran.
feature-deal-description: Gabagabee wada hadalka oo dhamee iibka ama kiiraynta hantida si aad u sameeyso ganacsi.
sell-subtitle: Raac tillaabooyinkan fudud si aad u liistid hantidaada, u soo jiidato iibsade-yaasha, oo si dhaqso ah u xidhid heshiiska.
sell-prepare-description: Nadiifi, kala saar, oo samee dayactirro loo baahan yahay si aad u hubiso in hantidaadu ay diyaar u tahay bandhigyada.
sell-list-description: Ku xayeysii hantidaada Kiraale.com iyadoo aad adeegsanayso sawiro tayo leh oo muujinaya sifooyinka ugu fiican ee hantidaada si aad u soo jiidato iibsade-yaasha.
sell-close-description: Dib u eeg dalabyada, kala xaajood iibsade-yaasha shuruudaha, oo dhammaystir iibka adigoo saxiixaya warqadaha wareejinayana milkiyadda.
subscribe-success: Waad ku mahadsan tahay isdiiwaangelinta! Waxaad heli doontaa cusboonaysiinta ugu dambeysa iyo macluumaadka.
subscribe-error: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la isdiiwaangelinayay. Fadlan isku day mar labaad!
address-info: Maka Al-Mukarramah Road, Waaberi District, Mogadishu, Somalia
Search-address-property: Raadi cinwaan, hanti ama magaca ganacsiga
what-we-do-subtitle: Waxaan fududeyneynaa ganacsiga hantida iyadoo la isku xirayo iibsade-yaasha, iibiye-yaasha, kirayste-yaasha, iyo milkiile-yaasha hantida si fudud.
privacy-overview-description: Kiraale waxaa ka go’an inay ilaaliso sirtaada iyo asturnaanta xogtaada. Siyaasaddan Asturnaanta macluumaadka waxay sharxeysaa sida aan u ururino, u adeegsanno, uguna ilaalinno macluumaadkaaga shaqsiga ah marka aad la falgaleyso madalkeenna. Haddii aad raadinayso hanti, ama xayeysiineyso guri, ama maamuleyso heshiisyada kireynta, waxaan hubinnaa in xogtaada si ammaan ah oo hufan loo maareeyo. Adeegsiga adeegyada Kiraale waxay ka dhigan tahay inaad ogoshahay ururinta iyo adeegsiga xogta sida ku xusan siyaasaddan. Waxaan si joogto ah u cusboonaysiinnaa hababka asturnaanta si aan u waafajino xeerarka wadanka iyo inaan u wanaajino khibradaada isticmaalkaaga madalkeenna.
privacy-use-1: Loo wanaajiyo khibrada isticmaalaha iyo adeegyada aan bixinno
privacy-use-2: Bixin taageerada macaamiisha oo looga jawaabo codsiyada
privacy-use-3: Fulinta ganacsiga iyo fududeynta lacag bixinta
privacy-use-4: Diritaanka cusboonaysiino, xayeysiin, iyo ogeysiisyada adeegga
privacy-use-5: Ka hortag khiyaano iyo wanaajin amniga
privacy-info-title: Macluumaadka Si Iskaa Ah Loo Bixiyo
privacy-info-description: Waxaan ururinaynaa xog shakhsiyeed iyo mid la xiriirta macaamil ganacsi si aan kuu siino khibrad sahlan oo la xiriirta hantida. Xogtan waxay ka koobnaan kartaa faahfaahinta xiriirka, doorbidka hantida, taariikhda bixinta lacagta, iyo isgaarsiinta dhex marta iibsade-yaasha, iibiye-yaasha, ama mulkiile-yaasha. Sidoo kale, xog ayaa laga heli karaa adeegyo saddexaad sida hababka lacag-bixinta iyo qalabka falanqaynta si aan u horumarinno adeegyadeenna. Xogtaada ma iibinno mana la wadaagno cid aadan u oggolaan, waxaana si gaar ah loogu oggol yahay shaqaalaha loo xilsaaray. Xogtaadu waxay naga caawisaa inaan kuu habeeyno khibraddaada, fududeyno macaamillada, isla markaana aan u hoggaansano shuruucda. Waxaad leedahay xukun buuxa oo ku saabsan macluumaadkaaga — waxaad xaq u leedahay inaad dib u eegto, cusboonaysiiso, ama codsato in la tirtiro markasta oo aad rabto.
terms-introduction-text: Ku soo dhawoow Kiraale. Markaad gasho ama isticmaasho madalkeena, waxaad oggolaatay inaad raacdo Shuruudaha iyo Qawaaniinta adeegsiga. Shuruudahani waxay qeexayaan xuquuqda iyo waajibaadka isticmaale-yaasha ee la xiriira liisaska hantida, si loo hubiyo macaamil cadaalad ah oo ammaan ah dhammaan dhinacyada ku lugta leh.
terms-user-agreements-text-1: Isticmaalayaashu waa inay bixiyaan macluumaad sax ah marka ay liistayaan ama raadinayaan hantida. Waxaan xaq u leenahay inaan joojino ama tirtirno akoonnada ku lug leh waxqabad khiyaano ah ama khiyaano guud.
terms-user-agreements-text-2: Markaad isticmaasho madalkeena, waxaad ogoshahay in dhammaan ganacsiga u dhexeeya iibiyaha iyo iibsadaha ama kiraystaha iyo milkiilaha ay qorsheeyaan dhinacyada ku lug leh, Kiraalena mas'uul kama aha dhibaatooyinka dhaqaale ee u dhexeeya Iibsade-yaasha iyo iibiyeyaasha ama Kirayste-yaasha iyo milkiilayaasha.
terms-user-agreements-text-3: Isticmaalayaashu waxay mas'uul ka yihiin inay xaqiijiyaan faahfaahinta hantida, fuliyaan baaritaan sax ah, oo hubiyaan raacitaanka shuruudaha sharciyeed ka hor inta aysan gabagabeyn ganacsiga.
terms-user-agreements-text-4: Kiraale kama aha mas'uul dhaawac, khasaare, ama khilaaf ka dhasha ganacsiga hantida ee lagu fuliyay madalkeena.
terms-user-agreements-text-5: Waxaan xaq u leenahay inaan cusboonaysiino ama wax ka beddelno Shuruudaha iyo Qawaaniinteena wakhti kasta. Isticmaalayaasha waxaa lagu wargelin doonaa isbeddel kasta, waxaana adeegsiga madalkeena loo tixgelinayaa oggolaansho shuruudaha cusub.
terms-restrictions-text: Waxaad si gaar ah uga reeban tahay inaad ku lug lahaato waxyaabaha soo socda:
terms-restriction-1: Gelin faahfaahin hanti taas oo been abuur ama khiyaano ah
terms-restriction-2: Isticmaalka madalkeena si sharci darro ah
terms-restriction-3: Faafinta wararka aan loo baahnayn ama cabsi gelinta isticmaale-yaasha kale
terms-restriction-4: Isku day inaad wax ka beddesho natiijooyinka raadinta
terms-restriction-5: Ku xad gud-bid sharciyada ganacsiga hantida ee Wadanka
terms-faq-title-1: Sidee ayuu u shaqeyso madalkeena Kiraale?
terms-faq-content-1: Madalkeennu waxuu isku xiraa iibsade-yaasha iyo iibiye-yaasha ama kirayste-yaasha iyo milkiile-yaasha hantida ma-guurtada ah si loo sameeyo ganacsi. Iibsade-yaasha ama kirayste-yaasha waxay baadhi karaan hantida la heli karo, la xiriiri karaan iibiye-yaasha, si toos ah oo fudud.
terms-faq-title-2: Ma u baahan tahay wakiil si aad u liistid ama iibsatid hanti?
terms-faq-content-2: Maya, waxaad liisti ama baadhi kartaa hantida si madax banaan. Hase yeeshe, haddii aad u baahan tahay caawimaad, waxaad la xiriiri kartaa wakiilo deggan oo madalkenna kuugu hagaya wada hagid iyo soo dhaweyn.
terms-faq-title-3: Maxaan sameyn karaa si aan u bilaabo iibinta?
terms-faq-content-3: Si aad u liistid hanti, abuur akoon, bixi faahfaahin sax ah, soo gudbi sawiro tayo leh, oo dejiso qiimo macquul ah. Hubi inaad leedahay milkiyadda sharciyeed iyo dukumiintiyada loo baahan yahay si loo sameeyo ganacsi fudud iyo hanti wareejin.
terms-faq-title-4: Maxaa dhacaya markaan helo weydiimo ku saabsan liistadayda?
terms-faq-content-4: Marka iibsade suurtagal ah kula soo xiriiro, kaga jawaab si degdeg ah faahfaahinta la codsaday. Qorshee bandhigyada goob aamin ah oo iska hubi wax walbo intaadan u gudbin ganacsiga iyo iibka.
pricing-feature-1: Sawiro tayo leh oo aan xad lahayn
pricing-rental-feature-2: Si fudud wax uga beddel ama tirtir faahfaahinta hantida
pricing-sale-feature-2: Si fudud wax uga beddel ama tirtir faahfaahinta hantida
pricing-management-feature-3: Lacag kiraysi ah oo la damaanad qaaday bil walbo.
contact-phone-description: Nagala soo xiriir wakhti kasta wixii su’aalo ama taageero ah. Kooxdeennu waxay diyaar u tahay inay ku caawiso.
contact-email-description: Caawimaad ama ganacsi su'aalo ah, noo soo dir email.
contact-location-description: Booqo xafiiskeena si aad u hesho taageero gaar ah iyo jawaabaha su'aalahaaga.
contact-location-address: Maka Al-Mukarramah Road, Waaberi District, Mogadishu, Somalia
my-properties-description: Maamul liistada hantidaada, ku dar kuwa aad jeceshahay, calaamadee inay iibsan yihiin ama la kiraystay, oo wax ka beddel ama tirtir.
deactivate-account-desc: Ma hubtaa inaad rabto inaad xayirto akoonkaaga? Akoonkaaga waa la calaamadeyn doonaa inuu xayiran yahay, si kastaba ha ahaatee waxaad mar walba dib uga bixin kartaa xayiradda marka aad rabto adigoo soo galayaa akoonkaaga sida caadiga ah.
profile-details-updated-successfully: Faahfaahinta macluumaad-ka si guul leh ayaa loo cusboonaysiiyey.
something-went-wrong: Wax khaldan ayaa dhacay. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.
password-updated-successfully: Furaha si guul leh ayaa loo cusboonaysiiyey.
account-deactivation-successfully: Akoonka si guul leh ayaa loo xayiray. Waxaad dib uga qaadi kartaa xayiraadda marka aad rabto adigoo soo galaya akoonkaaga sida caadiga ah.
invalid-file-type: Nooca faylka ma ahan sax. Fadlan soo gudbi sawir sax ah.
images-saved-go-to-payment: Sawirrada si guul leh ayaa loo keydiyey. Hadda waxaad u gudbi kartaa lacag bixinta si aad u dhammaystirto liiskaaga.
images-saved-go-to-my-properties: Sawirrada si guul leh ayaa loo keydiyey. Waxaad u gudbin doontaa bogga "Hantidayda" ee dashboard-ka si aad u aragto hantidaada.

payment.title: Lacag bixinta:
payment.payment-method-select: Xulo ikhtiyaarka lacag bixinta aad jeceshahay
payment.generic-error: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la fulinayay lacag bixintaada. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.
payment.initiation-failed: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la bilaabayay lacag bixinta. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.

mpesa.title: M-Pesa
mpesa.phone-invalid: Lambarka taleefanka M-Pesa sax ma ahan.
mpesa.initiated: Lacag bixintii waa la bilaabay. Fadlan hubi app-ka M-Pesa si aad u dhameyso lacag bixinta.
mpesa.success: Lacag bixintii waa lagu guulaystay. Waxaad heleysaa email xaqiijin ah dhawaan.
mpesa.failed: Lacag-bixinta M-Pesa way guuldarreysatay. Fadlan isku day mar kale

evc.phone-invalid: Lambarka taleefanka EVC Plus aan sax ahayn.
evc.initiated: Lacag bixintii waa la bilaabay. Fadlan hubi app-ka EVC Plus si aad u dhameyso lacag bixinta.
evc.success: Lacag bixintii waa lagu guulaystay. Waxaad heleysaa email xaqiijin ah dhawaan.
evc.failed: Lacag-bixinta EVC Plus way guuldarreysatay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.

not-found.title: Bogga Lama Helin?
not-found.description2: Waxay u egtahay in bogga aad raadinaysay aan la helin

password-reset-email-sent: Emailka dib u sixidda furaha si guul leh ayaa loo diray. Fadlan fiiri sanduuqaaga email-ka si aad u hesho tilmaamo dheeri ah.
password-reset-email-failed: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii la dirayay emailka dib u sixidda furaha. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.
password-reset-instructions: Fadlan geli furahaaga cusub hoos. Hubi inaad doorato fure xooggan oo aadan hore u isticmaalin, 2-da fure waa inay isku mid yihiin.
password-reset-success: Furaha si guul leh ayaa dib loogu saxay. Hadda waxaad ku geli kartaa akoonkaaga iyadoo add adeegsanayso furaha cusub.
password-reset-failed: Khalad ayaa dhacay markii dib loo saxayay furaha. Fadlan isku day mar labaad.
invalid-reset-token: Tokenka dib u sixidda furaha sax ma ahan. Fadlan codso dib u sixid fure cusub mar kale.
pending-properties-description: Hantida sugaysa ansixinta waa kuwa hadda la eegayo ama sugaya ansixinta.
rejected-properties-description: Hantida la diiday waa kuwa aan buuxin shuruudaha laga maarmaanka ah ama aan la ansixin.
no-pending-properties: Hanti aan la ansixin Lama Helin
no-pending-properties-description: Hanti aan la ansixin lama helin wakhtigan.
no-rejected-properties-description: Hanti aan la diiday lama helin wakhtigan.
property-approved: Hantida si guul leh ayaa loo ansixiyey.
property-rejected: Hantida si guul leh ayaa loo diiday.
property-deleted: Hantida si guul leh ayaa loo tirtiray.
property-deletion-failed: Tirtirida hantida waa lagu guuldareysatay. Fadlan isku day mar kale.
